name: Acrobat Gecko Free
description:
Kaloo is a very friendly little gecko who loves to do stunts.
He jumps so high on his trampoline, that maybe one day, he will touch the stars ...
To gain strength, he must catch insects in its path.
But beware, some may hit him very badly.
Come help Kaloo to jump higher and higher.
Use the accelerometer to control your Gecko.
Be careful not to miss the trampoline!

Share your score online and try to stay in the world ranking.
The flag of your country will appear on the international scores table.

••• Game Features •••

• Very fun Graphics and Animations
• Kaloo, the little Gecko, is very endearing
• Jump heigher and heigher and try to touch the stars
